item.title: Microsoft 365 E5 Compliance now available as an add-on for Microsoft 365 Business Premium
item.description: Small and medium businesses (SMBs) face growing data security and compliance demands. Microsoft 365 Business Premium is our comprehensive productivity and security solution designed for small and medium-sized businesses (up to 300 users). It includes Office apps, Teams, advanced security (like Defender for Business), and device management, all in one cost-effective package. We’re excited to announce that starting late August 2025, Microsoft 365 Business Premium customers will be eligible to purchase Microsoft 365 E5 Compliance as an add-on, bringing enterprise-grade capabilities to Microsoft...
